changelog:
## BurgTV v1.0.80

### New Features
- Xtream Provider Data Integration (tmdbId, trailer, is_adult, rating)
- Skip API calls with provider tmdbId (35% movies, 100% series)

### TV Guide
- Year-based matching prevents wrong movie selection
- Adult content filtered from search results

### Bug Fixes
- SeriesDetailComposeDialog saves tmdbId to DB
- ParentalControlManager uses provider is_adult flag
